item.title: How to Hugo
item.description: Introduction After graduating from college, I finally decided to start a blog / journal to record my miscellaneous adventures and life stories. I have tried many blog services before, such as WordPress, Blogger, and Tistory (Korean blogging platform), but every blog ended up neglected and abandoned. This time around, I wanted to build my own website instead of relying on the readily available blog platforms. While searching around for for static site generators (SSG), I had two candidates: Jekyll and Hugo.

item.title: Google Redirect Link Adventures
item.description: Suspicious links from Skype This afternoon I received a couple of suspicious link s from my friends on Skype whom I didn’t talk in ages. It was quite apparent that their accounts were compromised, and clicking the link would result in some unpleasant events. The Links These were the messages I received. The link contained URL-encoded “HTTP://” (%68%74%74%70%3A%2F%2F), so I could tell this is a link disguised as a Google search link.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Jeong Min Lim. This is my blog to record miscellaneous items. You can see my portfolio at https://jeongm.in

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello Very first post. This blog is a journal of random entries.
